title: ombhattu bAgiloLu
sahitya:
ombhattu bAgiloLu ondE divige hacci nambikillada samsAra mADidene suviyA bIbi


caraNam 1    tanuvemba kallinoLu manavembo dhAnyava tumbi vanavanadu navabELe bIsidane
    caraNam 2    aSTa kartugaLembo aSTa navadhAnyava tandu kuTTi kaTTi kajjAya karidene
    caraNam 3    aSTa kartugaLembo kAlavannuLuhi nAnu niSTeyindali annava bAgidene
    caraNam 4    aSTaroLagenna gaNDa bandu Aduva maDikeya oDedu muTTi muridu molege hAkidane
    caraNam 5    uDuva sIreya seLedu giDada toppala suttu tirugi bAradhAnge mADidane
    caraNam 6    mADide ogatanava nambikillada samsArava necci kUDide purandara viTTalanna dAsara
